tips: The three predefined classes are "daily", "weekly" and "challenges". Using these classes will properly filter them in their respective tabs.
Any non-specific class will be categorized under the Miscellaneous tab.
An empty class string will be labeled as "Misc."
Count should be a positive, non-zero integer.
Dailies will automatically reset at midnight local time, and Weeklies will reset midnight once Saturday rolls over to Sunday.
